---

# useSendTransaction

Send a TX request as a user operation and wait for it to be mined

## Import

```ts
import { useSendTransaction } from "@account-kit/react";
```

## Usage

```tsx
import { useSendTransaction, useSmartAccountClient } from "@account-kit/react";

function ComponentWithSendTransaction() {
  const { client } = useSmartAccountClient({
    type: "MultiOwnerModularAccount",
  });

  const { sendTransaction, isSendingTransaction } = useSendTransaction({
    client,
    onSuccess: (hash) => {
      // [optional] Do something with the hash
    },
    onError: (error) => {
      // [optional] Do something with the error
    },
    // [optional] ...additional mutationArgs
  });

  return (
    <div>
      <button
        onClick={() =>
          sendTransaction({
            to: "0xTARGET_ADDRESS",
            data: "0x",
            value: 0n,
            account: "0xACCOUNT_ADDRESS",
            chain: sepolia,
            // ... other parameters
          })
        }
        disabled={isSendingTransaction}
      >
        {isSendingTransaction ? "Sending..." : "Send Txn"}
      </button>
    </div>
  );
}
```

## Parameters

### params

`UseSendTransactionArgs`

- parameters for sending a transaction

  ## Returns

  `UseSendTransactionResult`
  functions and state for sending txs
